EN: Our new homeland is on a group of islands which,  whilst beautiful,  are also full of uncertainty.  We must set up a base and establish ourselves here.
CN: 美丽而又充满未知的岛屿将是我们新的家园, 我们需要建立基地站稳脚跟.

EN: First a dragon appeared,  and then an Elf.  It seemed they had stumbled upon us by chance,  maybe we can live in peace with these natives.
CN: 龙出现了, 然后是精灵. 他们看起来没有敌意, 或许我们可以跟这群原住民和平相处.

EN: We discovered an altar forged out of rock and steel,  protected by a group of very small people.  Their leader was quite an interesting little fellow,  but also very stubborn.
CN: 我们发现了一座石材和钢铁铸成的祭坛, 一群矮小的家伙守护在那里. 为首的一个虽顽固但相当有趣.

EN: I guess it's time to explore the wolrd outside.  The islands are far more than I could see.  Maybe we are lucky to hit pay dirt.
CN: 也许是时候往外面的世界了, 这个岛远比我想象中大. 听说岛上有很多远古遗留至今的城市残骸, 或许能找到好东西.

EN: The ancient cities got their own characteristics.  Residents of edge's pay tributes to the Central City as a vital strategic area.  Why don't we take it first.
CN: 那些远古城市各有特色. 外围居民愿意上交贡品求得安宁, 中心城市则为战略要地, 我们何不先下手为强.

EN: There are many of the survivors on the island!  Take the Mountain Pass to recruit Heroes from other states,  thus we can develop together.
CN: 这硕大的岛上, 居然有那么多幸存者. 或许打通边境, 就可以与其他国的人共同发展, 招募更多强者.

EN: Alliances scrambling,  there's no peace in the world.  It's our time to end this turbulent days.
CN: 有太多联盟相互争抢, 难以和平. 或许, 我们应该努力结束这乱世?

EN: We've gained steady progress since known of situation.  But I can sense the growing of darkness.  Devils are coming…
CN: 自从接受现状, 我们稳步向前, 却让我觉得或许有一种阴谋正在蓄力, 恶魔要来了?

EN: We were told the resources are getting more and more near the center of the island.  But Devils had taken there.  Noting ventured,  nothing gained!  It's time to go and check it out!
CN: 有人曾说, 越往岛中心区域走, 越能发现更多丰富的资源, 但已被恶魔占领. 富贵险中求, 或许是时候去一探究竟了.

EN: There are Devil Princes and Devil Soldiers.  Fellows are racking minds to vanish them,  but I,  I want to recruit them on my side.
CN: 终于知道恶魔也是有魔王和小兵之分. 伙伴们都在讨论怎么消灭他们, 我却在想象, 或许可以招募为己用.

EN: The situation is hard deal with as other alliancess' scramling around and Devils may come at any time.  We must be strong enough to survive.
CN: 情况越来越混乱, 前后有各个联盟危及, 还有恶魔随时可能加入战场. 这时, 只有实力够强, 才能站稳脚跟.

EN: The nearer to the Forbidden Dragon District,  the more conflicts occur.  We're told the Dragon will guard the world,  but how can we gain their blessing?  It sees we can only unify the world under their helps.
CN: 距离龙之禁区越来越近, 纷争就越来越密集. 传闻龙族维护世界和平, 怎么才能获得他们的眷顾?相信只有这样, 才能一统天下.
